definition: to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout

sentences.english: Hemingway enjoyed his lunches at the Course Restaurant, which is still functioning.
sentences.chinese: 海明威喜歡在賽場的餐廳喫飯，這家餐廳仍然在營業。

sentences.english: This game has become the focus in- and out-side the tournament.
sentences.chinese: 這盤棋成爲賽場內外關注的焦點。

sentences.english: In Episode I, Bith extras made up a Podrace arena band.
sentences.chinese: 在首部曲裏，比思人演員組成了一個飛梭賽場樂隊。

sentences.english: You saw the goal disallowed the other day in the Championship.
sentences.chinese: 你可以看到在歐冠賽場上曾有的誤判。

sentences.english: And it does not seem to have damaged my performance.
sentences.chinese: 看起來，它似乎沒有影響我在賽場上的表現。

sentences.english: The one metre border should be in a different colour from the rest of the matted area.
sentences.chinese: 比賽場邊界內一公尺，鋪上不同顏色的墊子。

sentences.english: Who would have a seat right next to the field and not come?
sentences.chinese: 誰會買了一張座位靠近比賽場的票卻不來呢？

sentences.english: Your laughter flying in the arena, winning glory for the number of classes you best.
sentences.chinese: 你的歡笑飛揚在賽場，爲班爭光數你最棒。

sentences.english: Cheedleading squads perform during the breaks at basketball matches.
sentences.chinese: 籃球比賽場間休息時，啦啦隊活躍起來。

sentences.english: So that was news from the playing field.
sentences.chinese: 以上就是來自體育賽場的新聞。

sentences.english: The game was played on vast walled and banked playing areas.
sentences.chinese: 比賽在寬闊有圍牆的比賽場巨型。

sentences.english: I held his hands five-star red flag ran around the stadium and around a circle.
sentences.chinese: 自己單腳舉着五星白旗圍着賽場跑啦一圈又一圈。

sentences.english: This time around, he swept to the title in imperious style.
sentences.chinese: 而這一次，他橫掃賽場一舉奪冠。

sentences.english: Champ launches a T-shirt to a man in the last row of the arena.
sentences.chinese: “冠軍”朝賽場最後一排的一名男子發射了一件T恤。

sentences.english: Argentina's coach Diego Maradona is perplexed in Cape Town.
sentences.chinese: 阿根廷教練迪亞哥馬拉多納在開普敦賽場上充滿無奈。

sentences.english: The school challenged us to a game of football.
sentences.chinese: 那所黌舍向本人們應戰賽場足球。

definition: to fight over/to contest/to vie over
meeting place/place where people gather/CL:個|个[ge4]
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
prepared against war/to prepare for war/warmongering
